text: "You're All I've Got Tonight" is a 1978 song by American rock new wave band The Cars and is the sixth track from their debut album The Cars. Like Bye Bye Love, Moving in Stereo and All Mixed Up, three other songs from the album, it continues to get regular airplay on classic rock stations and despite not being released as singles. Category:1978 songs Category:The Cars songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: You're All I've Got Tonight
